ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!
ygData.msgSnippet: ARRRGH.  I take back what I said earlier, thank got they did not patch today! WHY must VI spend so much time screwing around with nerfing bards when so much is
ygData.messageBody:
ARRRGH. I take back what I said earlier, thank got they did not patch
today!

WHY must VI spend so much time screwing around with nerfing bards when so
much is still broken and ignored!?

I think I have had one too many Mountain Dews today, I feel my heart rate
increasing.

-Faras

-----Original Message-----
From: Cranfill, Wendy [mailto:Wendy_Cranfill@...]
Sent: Tuesday, October 31, 2000 2:33 PM
To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Change to bard song mechanics on Test!


Hmm maybe I read the thread wrong but it seemed like Absor was going to
seriously look into it? Dunno, maybe I'm an optimist. Not to say we
shouldn't raise a stink if in fact it happens cuz that would just plain
suck, specially for lev and invis ...
